Key Match Events: The Bulls had a lopsided loss to the Pacers, despite Zach LaVine having his fourth straight 30-plus scoring night.
Post-Match Reflections: Hopefully Arturas Karnisovas, the Bulls' executive vice president of basketball operations, was taking a good, hard look at the team's performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pacers played with pace and got consistent looks on offense when the three-pointer wasn't falling, while the Bulls struggled with inconsistent play.
Others: The Bulls still searching for answers to unlock forward Patrick Williams.
